Class OpenSocial::Connection
In: lib/opensocial/connection.rb
Parent: Object

Describes a connection to an OpenSocial container, including the ability to declare an authorization mechanism and appropriate credentials.

Methods

ORKUT = { :endpoint => 'http://sandbox.orkut.com/social', :rest => 'rest/', :rpc => 'rpc/', :content_type => 'application/json', :post_body_signing => false, :use_request_body_hash => true }

Attributes

auth  [RW]  Defines the authentication scheme: HMAC or security token.
consumer_key  [RW]  Defines the consumer key for OAuth.
consumer_secret  [RW]  Defines the consumer secret for OAuth.
consumer_token  [RW]  Defines the consumer token for OAuth.
container  [RW]  Defines the container that will be used in requests.
content_type  [RW]  Defines the content-type when sending a request body
post_body_signing  [RW]  Defines whether or not to sign the request body (treating the body as a large query parameter for the purposes of the signature base string)
st  [RW]  Defines the security token, for when OAuth is not in use.
use_request_body_hash  [RW]  Defines whether or not to sign the body using a request body hash
xoauth_requestor_id  [RW]  Defines the ID of the requestor (required by some implementations when using OAuth).

Public Class methods

new(options = {})

Initializes the Connection using the supplied options hash, or the defaults. Verifies that the supplied authentication type has proper (ie. non-blank) credentials, and that the authentication type is known.

Public Instance methods

service_uri(service, guid, selector, pid)

Constructs a URI to the OpenSocial endpoint given a service, guid, selector, and pid.

sign!(http, req)

Signs a request using OAuth.
